nodes.excerpt: Your same bank account, but without the annoying fees. Enjoy fee-free banking with your current account, no need to switch banks or open new accounts. Waiver blocks overdraft, maintenance and late credit card fees.

nodes.excerpt: Fintoc enables developers to initiate bank transfers and pull transactional data from their users' bank accounts. Whether an app wants to automate bank reconciliation or improve its underwriting process, Fintoc is the way to go in Latin America.

nodes.excerpt: MakeMyFund enables investors to build and invest in their own fully personalized efunds - without being experts in capital markets. The idea is to deliver 3%-5% higher returns than conventional mutual funds - most of this based on lower cost and tax savings.
nodes.title: MakeMyFund - Personalized virtual equity fund
